User Story: Display of the CMP indicator on the Submission Summary Screen
AcceptanceCriteria:
1. Given a user (Shared Services/Operations/UW Support) logs into DWF
2. And create/opens a NB or renewal submission record from My List on the submission work queue (applicable for all products including NA AL/GL/WC, EU other products & NA FL)
3. When user lands on Submission Summary screen
4. Then system displays a Control Master Program field under the insured section on the submission screen
TestSteps:
1. Create Submission in Dashboard page
2. Create New Submission in New Submission page
3. Search a producer in new submission in Search Producer page
4. Search Insured in new submission in Search Insured page
5. Click new account button in Create New Account Warning page
6. Create new account in Create New Account Page
7. Fill Broker Contact in Broker Contact Page
8. Validate if toggle field for 'Control Master Program' is available in 'Insured section' of Submission Finish and Close page
9. Validate 'Control Master Program' toggle value is defaulted to 'No'.
10. Change the toggle value for 'Control Master Program' to 'Yes'.
11. Get Submission Number and click Finish and Close in Submission Finish and Close page
12. Perform Advanced Search in My View Page
13. Search Submission Number in Advanced Search page
14. Click Continue in Underwriting Notification page
15. Validate if toggle field for 'Control Master Program' is available in 'Account Summary' screen.
16. Validate if toggle value for Control Master Program is 'Yes'.
Expected Results:
User should be able to navigate to ‘Country – Business Unit – Division – UW’ screen.
User should be able to provide value for Country, BU, Division & UW.
On clicking Continue button in ‘Country – Business Unit – Division – UW’ screen, user should land on ‘Search Producer' screen followed by successfully performing producer search & selection operation.
On clicking Continue button in ‘Search Producer' screen, user should land on ‘Search Insured' screen.
User should be able to hit new account warning page button.
User should be able to create new account.
User should be able to fill broker contact in broker contact page.
Toggle field for 'Control Master Program'  should be available in 'Insured section' of Submission Finish and Close page
Default Toggle value for 'Control Master Program' should be 'No'.
User should be able to change the toggle value for 'Control Master Program' to 'Yes'.
User should be able to create submission without getting any error.
User should be able to search  with the 'Submission'.
User should be able to select the 'Submission' in UW Console after getting the search result.
On clicking on Submission in UW Console, user should be able to land on 'UW Notification' screen and select continue button.
In Account Summary, user should be able to validate if toggle field for Control Master Program is available.
Toggle value for Control Master Program should be 'Yes'.
